title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 351 of 2020)), hereby
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Roads Act 1993 (Classification of
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Roads Act 1993 (Classification of 

Regional Roads) (Amendment) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited road act 1993 (classification regional roads) (amendment) order 2021

title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 351 of 2020)), hereby
heading: 2. The Roads Act 1993 (Classification of Regional Roads) Order 2012
text_raw:
2. The Roads Act 1993 (Classification of Regional Roads) Order 2012 

(S.I. No. 54 of 2012) is amended in the Schedule – 

(a) by the substitution of the following for the matter in column (2) 

opposite the mention of the regional road R286 in column (1): 

“Sligo - Pollboy, County Leitrim 

Between its junction with R870 at Lake Isle Road Sligo in the 
county of Sligo and its junction with N16 at Pollboy in the 
county of Leitrim via Connaughton Road, The Mall, Molloway 
Hill and Hazelwood Road at Sligo; Hazelwood Demense and 
Ballynamona in the county of Sligo: Sriff and Cornalaghta in the 
county of Leitrim.”, 

(b) by the substitution of the following for the matter in column (2) 

opposite the mention of the regional road R287 in column (1): 

“Sligo - Killarga, County Leitrim 

Between its junction with R870 at Temple Street Sligo in the 
county of Sligo and its junction with R280 at Lisgorman in the 
county of Leitrim via Mail Coach Road and Pearse Road at 
Sligo; Carraroe, Tullynagracken South, Lahanagh and 
Gortlownan in the county of Sligo: Ardakip Beg, Cleen and 
Socks in the county of Leitrim.”, 

(c) 

by the substitution of the following for the matter in column (2) 
opposite the mention of the regional road R291 in column (1): 

“Sligo - Rosses Point, County Sligo 

Between its junction with R287 at Mail Coach Road and its 
junction with R870 at Old Market Street via Pearse Road all at 
Sligo in the county of Sligo 

and 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 22nd January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [12] 3 

between its junction with R870 at Connaughton Road and its 
junction with N4 at Victoria Road via Markievicz Road all at 
Sligo in the county of Sligo 

and 

between its junction with N15 at Cartron Sligo and its terminal 
point at its junction with local road L3309 at Rosses Upper via 
Cartron Hill and Mardyke at Sligo; Ballincar, Ballyweelin and 
Rosses Point Promenade all in the county of Sligo.”, 

(d) by the substitution of the following for the matter in column (2) 

opposite the mention of the regional road R292 in column (1): 

“Sligo – Strandhill - Ballisadare, County Sligo 

Between its junction with R870 at Adelaide Street Sligo and its 
junction with N59 at Belladrehid via Lord Edward Street and 
Knappagh Road 
at Sligo; Cummeen, Killaspugbrone, 
Culleenamore, Seafield, Breeoge and Kilmacowen all in the 
county of Sligo.”, 

(e) 

by the insertion, after the mention of the regional road R868 in 
column (1) and the matter in column (2) opposite the mention of 
that regional road, of the following: 

“R869 Western Distributor Road, Sligo 

Between its junction with N4 at Caltragh and its junction with 
R292 at Ballydoogan via Derrydarrahy all at Sligo in the county 
of Sligo.”, 

and 

(f) 

by the substitution of the following for the matter in column (2) 
opposite the mention of the regional road R870 in column (1): 

“Sligo Town Centre Route 

Between its junction with R287 at Mail Coach Road and its 
junction with R286 at Connaughton Road via Temple Street, 
Adelaide Street, Wine Street, Lower Knox Street, Hyde Bridge 
and Markevich Road, (and via Lake Isle Road, Bridge Street, 
Thomas Street, Teeling Street, Old Market Street and Connolly 
Street) all at Sligo in the county of Sligo.”. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [12] 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

18 January, 2021. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [12] 5

title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 351 of 2020)), hereby
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

This order amends the Schedule of the Roads Act 1993 (Classification of 
Regional Roads) Order 2012 (S.I. No. 54 of 2012) to address a number of road 
classification issues arising mostly from the construction of the Sligo Western 
Distributor Road. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [12]
